timeline.bodyText: How exactly is this supposed to help?  At line 273 we reassign the dirs variable so I am a little confused as to how this fixes the periodic failure.
timeline.author: ivakegg

timeline.message:
To prevent periodic test cases failing, added --- prefix for UUDID for test cases to support queries with _ANYFIELD_ starting with particular
letters
